instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: a1706 820-00239-A  no image
threads.message:
Hi, I have this macbook where I don't see images but the backlight is active because the display, despite being dark, can be seen that it is illuminated
With an external monitor it works

threads.title: a1706 820-00239-A  no image
threads.message:
DP_INT_HPD stays high?
Check diode mode to ground on all EDP_INT_ lines of J8500.

threads.title: a1706 820-00239-A  no image
threads.message:
DP_INT_HPD=0
no short on  all EDP_INT_ lines

threads.title: a1706 820-00239-A  no image
threads.message:
I didn't ask to check for short!
Compare diode mode readings with good board.
